content:
Colter Bay Campground is a fantastic choice! Yes, Colter Bay Campground does offer electric hookups for some of their campsites. Here's what you need to know:

**Electric Hookups at Colter Bay Campground**

* Colter Bay Campground has 350 campsites, and 100 of them have electric hookups (30-amp).
* The campsites with electric hookups are located in the "Electric Loop" section of the campground.
* These sites can accommodate RVs and trailers up to 45 feet in length.

**Reserving an Electric Campsite**

To reserve an electric campsite at Colter Bay Campground, you'll need to book through recreation.gov. Here's how:

1. Go to recreation.gov and search for Colter Bay Campground.
2. Click on the "Make a Reservation" button.
3. Select your dates and party size.
4. In the "Site Type" dropdown menu, select "Electric" to filter the available sites.
5. Choose your preferred electric campsite from the available options.
6. Complete the reservation process by providing your personal and payment information.

**Tips and Reminders**

* Electric campsites are available on a first-come, first-served basis, so book early to ensure availability.
* Be sure to select the correct site type (Electric) and specify your RV/trailer length to ensure a compatible site.
* If you have a larger RV/trailer, some electric sites may have length restrictions, so double-check the site details before booking.
* Colter Bay Campground has a 6-month reservation window, so you can book your site up to 6 months in advance.

By following these steps, you should be able to reserve an electric campsite at Colter Bay Campground. Enjoy your stay!
